description:
Life at Arq

At Arq Group, our purpose is to unleash the possibilities between businesses and people. We are a digital solutions business. We create unforgettable experiences, solve complex challenges and provides seamless, end-to-end solutions for businesses big and small. As part of Arq Group we have a suite of specialist businesses including Outware Mobile, Infoready and WME. 

We have passionate, talented people – with a diverse set of skills and capabilities. Together, we deliver solutions that matter and change the way businesses DO business. But it’s not just WHAT we do, it’s how we do it - our ‘Ways’ reflect our culture, how we play and deliver every day.​​

At Arq Group:

We Own it

We’re Smarter Together

We Work with Heart 

We Change it Up! 

Join us and find your Space to (Change).


Jamuna, Digital Marketing Coordinator


Empowering women at Arq Group

We’re passionate about gender equality. And we are constantly evolving the programs and initiatives that create a truly diverse workplace. We have breastfeeding rooms. We have installed care packs in ladies' bathrooms. We create career development opportunities for women. We take personal pride in our efforts to close the gender pay gap. We’re regulars at networking events and host events internally to promote women at Arq Group. Our people push for new ideas and advocate for change. We’re inspired to constantly be better. 

Ha, People and Culture Advisor​​


Flexibility

We want to enable our people to enjoy their hobbies, invest in their personal growth and development, look after their wellbeing and balance family and work life. We have many diverse examples of flexibility for a diverse group of people. What does flexibility mean to us? Its talking about flexibility at every stage of your work life. 


Mandy, Agile Practice Lead

Belonging

We’re a digital services company. Innovation is in our DNA. True innovation is built in a culture of diverse thought and collaboration. Our space, our environment, our culture is designed to make you feel like you belong. We celebrate our differences. We seek unique perspectives and encourage our people to bring their whole self to work. 


Loredana, Talent Acquisition Coordinator​
